short_description: ROLLED 2026 WALL CALENDAR: 2026 yearly wall calendar from January 2026 to December 2026. This item ships rolled and is NOT folded!

WET ERASE vs. DRY ERASE 2026 CALENDAR? Why do we promote Wet Erase markers? Wet Erase most importantly will not ghost or stain! No matter what any company claims - dry erase can stain or "ghost" due to the acids in the inks. Wet Erase is also very durable, doesn't fade and will not wipe off accidentally by rubbing against it while writing in other date blocks. SwiftGlimpse Wet-Erase markers sold separately - not included.
